mapper.sql: SELECT de.iddetesquela ,de.idesquela ,de.unineg ,de.idestudiante ,de.asunto ,de.status ,de.creapor ,de.creafecha ,de.mensaje as mensajeDeta ,CONVERT(varchar,de.creafecha,105) as fecha ,de.modipor ,de.modiver ,es.idestudiante as codEstudiante ,pe.idpersona ,pe.nombre ,pe.apepat ,pe.apemat ,pe.correo ,esq.titulo ,esq.mensaje ,esq.idtipoesquela ,(case when esq.flgenvioapo = 1 then 'Destino Padre' when esq.flgenviomama = 1 then 'Destino Madre' when esq.flgenviopapa = 1 then 'Destino Apoderado' when esq.flgenviorespago = 1 then 'Destino Resp. Pago' end) as destino ,(case when esq.flgenvioapo = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idapoderado = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviomama = 1 then (select CONCAT(pe.apepat,' ',pe.apemat,',',pe.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona pe on fa.idmadre = pe.idpersona and fa.unineg = pe.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviopapa = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona p on fa.idpadre = p.idpersona and fa.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviorespago = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idresppago = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) end) as destinoPer ,CONVERT(varchar,getDate(),105) as fechaActual ,(case when esq.flgenvioapo = 1 then (select ISNULL(p.correo,'SIN CORREO') as correo from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idapoderado = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviomama = 1 then (select ISNULL(pe.correo,'SIN CORREO') as correo from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona pe on fa.idmadre = pe.idpersona and fa.unineg = pe.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviopapa = 1 then (select ISNULL(p.correo,'SIN CORREO') as correo from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona p on fa.idpadre = p.idpersona and fa.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviorespago = 1 then (select ISNULL(pe.correo,'SIN CORREO') as correo from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idresppago = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) end) as correo FROM MM_DetEsquela de left join MX_Estudiante es on de.idestudiante = es.idestudiante left join MX_Persona pe on es.idestudiante = pe.idpersona left join MM_Esquela esq on esq.idesquela = de.idesquela
SELECT COUNT(CONCAT(datepart(DAY,creafecha),'-',datepart(MONTH,creafecha),'-',datepart(year,creafecha))) as fechaFull , CONVERT(varchar,creafecha,105) as fecha from MM_DetEsquela
select distinct es.idesquela,es.titulo,es.mensaje from MM_DetEsquela de inner join MM_Esquela es on de.idesquela = es.idesquela
mapper.select: WHERE de.status = 1 and de.uniNeg = #{uniNeg} and de.idesquela = #{idEsquela}
WHERE de.status = 0 and de.uniNeg = #{uniNeg} and de.idesquela = #{idEsquela}

WHERE uniNeg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg} and idesquela in (select idesquela from MM_Esquela where unineg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg}) group by uniNeg , CONVERT(varchar,creafecha,105) , datepart(MONTH,creafecha) order by datepart(MONTH,creafecha)
WHERE CONVERT(varchar,de.creafecha,105) = #{fecha} and de.uniNeg=#{uniNeg} and de.status = #{status}
where de.idesquela in (select idesquela from MM_Esquela where unineg = #{uniNeg}) and de.unineg = #{uniNeg} and CONVERT(varchar,de.creafecha,105) = #{fecha}
select max(idDetEsquela) from MM_DetEsquela WHERE uniNeg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg}

SELECT es.idestudiante as codEstudiante ,pe.idpersona ,es.idestudiante ,esq.titulo as asunto ,esq.mensaje ,CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),107) as fecha ,(case when esq.flgenvioapo = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idapoderado = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviomama = 1 then (select CONCAT(pe.apepat,' ',pe.apemat,',',pe.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona pe on fa.idmadre = pe.idpersona and fa.unineg = pe.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviopapa = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Familia fa on e.idfamilia = fa.idfamilia and e.unineg = fa.unineg left join MX_Persona p on fa.idpadre = p.idpersona and fa.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) when esq.flgenviorespago = 1 then (select CONCAT(p.apepat,' ',p.apemat,',',p.nombre) as nombre from MX_Estudiante e left join MX_Persona p on e.idresppago = p.idpersona and e.unineg = p.unineg where e.unineg = de.unineg and e.idestudiante = de.idestudiante) end) as nombreFamilia ,ISNULL(es.viadomi,'SIN DIRECCION') as direccion ,uni.nombreUniNeg as uniNegPer,en.iddistrito,di.nombre as distrito ,'Carta de Notificaci√≥n' as titulo FROM MM_DetEsquela de left join MX_Estudiante es on de.idestudiante = es.idestudiante left join MX_Persona pe on es.idestudiante = pe.idpersona left join MM_Esquela esq on esq.idesquela = de.idesquela inner join MO_UnidadNegocio uni on de.unineg = uni.unineg inner join MO_Entidad en on uni.RUC = en.ruc and uni.unineg = en.unineg inner join MO_Distrito di on en.iddistrito = di.iddistrito where de.unineg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg} and de.idesquela = #{esquelaBean.idEsquela}
select isnull(max(idesquela),0) from MM_DetEsquela where unineg = #{uniNeg}
where de.unineg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg} and de.idTipoEstado = #{idTipoEstado} and de.creapor = #{creaPor}
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_detEsquela set idTipoEstado = #{idTipoEstado} , modipor = #{modiPor} where iddetesquela = #{idDetEsquela} and unineg = #{unidadNegocioBean.uniNeg}
